sentences.sentence: His stepfather ran a prosperous paint business.
sentences.translation: 他的继父曾经营一家生意兴旺的涂料公司。

sentences.sentence: My stepfather came into the scene when I was four.
sentences.translation: 在我四岁的时候，我的继父就出现了。

sentences.sentence: He was curious and so we went with his stepfather, Walt, joining us.
sentences.translation: 他很好奇，所以我们和他的继父沃尔特一起去了。
